class.name: com.navis.road.business.model.ArchiveTruckTransaction
class.meta: create index ar_tran_chs_pos_anchor_idx on road_ar_truck_transactions(chs_pos_anchor) INDEXTYPE IS MDSYS.SPATIAL_INDEX; create index ar_tran_ctr_pos_anchor_idx on road_ar_truck_transactions(ctr_pos_anchor) INDEXTYPE IS MDSYS.SPATIAL_INDEX;

create spatial index ar_tran_chs_pos_anchor_idx on road_ar_truck_transactions(chs_pos_anchor) with ( bounding_box = ( 0, 0, 1000000, 1000000 ) ); create spatial index ar_tran_ctr_pos_anchor_idx on road_ar_truck_transactions(ctr_pos_anchor) with ( bounding_box = ( 0, 0, 1000000, 1000000 ) );

property.name: arTranArchiveDate
property.meta: The time this entity was archived.

property.name: arTranOriginalGkey
property.meta: gkey of the original Unit before it's been purged/archived.

property.name: arTranCtrMnrStatusId
property.meta: Maintenance and Repair status for container

property.name: arTranVentUnit
property.meta: Unit (%,cubic feet per minute, etc.) that goes with the vent required and vent setting fields.

property.name: arTranFailureAction
property.meta: Highest level action code of failed business tasks

component.name: arTranCtrPositionComp
component.meta: The position of the truck from the perspective of this facility

property.name: arPosLocType
property.meta: An Enum giving the type of position

property.name: arPosLocId
property.meta: A String giving the Id of the location: either a yard code, or carrier visit Id

property.name: arPosLocGkey
property.meta: The gkey of the Yard or CarrierVisit of this Position

property.name: arPosSlot
property.meta: A String giving the coordinates of the Position within its Location

property.name: arPosOrientation
property.meta: A String defining the orientation of the truck within this Position

property.name: arPosName
property.meta: A String formatted for the user that represents the position

many-to-one.name: arPosBin
many-to-one.meta: The bin to which this Position points to.

property.name: arPosTier
property.meta: An integer specifying the tier for this Position.

property.name: arPosAnchor
property.meta: xyz anchor point in bin's coordinate system.

property.name: arPosOrientationDegrees
property.meta: Orientation in degrees in bin's coordinate system.

component.name: arTranChsPositionComp
component.meta: The position of the truck from the perspective of this facility

property.name: arPosLocType
property.meta: An Enum giving the type of position

property.name: arPosLocId
property.meta: A String giving the Id of the location: either a yard code, or carrier visit Id

property.name: arPosLocGkey
property.meta: The gkey of the Yard or CarrierVisit of this Position

property.name: arPosSlot
property.meta: A String giving the coordinates of the Position within its Location

property.name: arPosOrientation
property.meta: A String defining the orientation of the truck within this Position

property.name: arPosName
property.meta: A String formatted for the user that represents the position

many-to-one.name: arPosBin
many-to-one.meta: The bin to which this Position points to.

property.name: arPosTier
property.meta: An integer specifying the tier for this Position.

property.name: arPosAnchor
property.meta: xyz anchor point in bin's coordinate system.

property.name: arPosOrientationDegrees
property.meta: Orientation in degrees in bin's coordinate system.

property.name: arTranChsAccessoryId
property.meta: Gate Transaction Equipment Id for chassis accessory

property.name: arTranCtrAccessoryId
property.meta: Gate Transaction Equipment Id for container accessory

property.name: arTranOptionalPod1Id
property.meta: Gate Transaction 1st optional discharge point id

many-to-one.name: arTranYard
many-to-one.meta: The Yard (if known) of this TruckTransaction

many-to-one.name: arTranComplex
many-to-one.meta: The Complex to which this TruckTransaction belongs.

many-to-one.name: arTranOperator
many-to-one.meta: Current operator of the Truck Transaction

property.name: arTranCancelReason
property.meta: Reason for cancelling a truck transaction

property.name: arTranExchangeLaneId
property.meta: Exchange Lane Id Assigned for this transaction

joined-subclass.name: com.navis.road.business.model.ArchiveTruckVisitDetails
joined-subclass.meta: create index ar_tvdtls_pos_anchor_idx on road_ar_truck_visit_details(pos_anchor) INDEXTYPE IS MDSYS.SPATIAL_INDEX;
create spatial index ar_tvdtls_pos_anchor_idx on road_ar_truck_visit_details(pos_anchor) with ( bounding_box = ( 0, 0, 1000000, 1000000 ) );
